tossup_question: 17) CHEMISTRY  When the change of enthalpy of a reaction is negative and the change of entropy of the same reaction is positive, the reaction is which of the following?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Always spontaneous
X) Spontaneous only under high temperature conditions 
Y) Spontaneous only under low temperature conditions 
Z) Never spontaneous
bonus_question: 17) CHEMISTRY  What is the common name given to the industrial reaction in which nitrogen and hydrogen are reacted with a catalyst, forming ammonia?
